message.content:
Ok, I would like to create a professional looking email that describes the update that I have made. I want it to look pretty and I want to be able to use it as a template for my future development updates. So I list the features that I have changed and these are also in creation language. So check for any misspellings there and correct them and make it look pretty. And also there is a video link for the demonstration of the new feature. So what would be the best way for me to send this email? Can we first try to create a template and then I need to ask you if there is a way that I can import this template to my Mozilla Thunderbird? Or do I need to create some kind of service to send this kind of email?


It is what my email looks like.

Pozdrav,

  Obavještavam vas o novim poboljšanjima u Gratis programu:

  Nova funkcionalnost navigacije:
  • Kada pregledavate inventar i kliknete na proizvod, a zatim se vratite - sada ćete se naći na istom mjestu gdje ste bili (neće vas više
  baciti na vrh stranice)
  • Pretraga se također pamti - ako pretražujete "gel" i odete u detalje proizvoda, kada se vratite pretraga "gel" će još uvijek biti aktivna
  • Promjena stranica (1, 2, 3...) vas sada pravilno vodi na vrh stranice

  Dodatno poboljšanje - Pametno upravljanje duplikatima:
  • Kada unosite novi proizvod koji već postoji sa istim nazivom, dobavljačem, serijskim brojem i rokom trajanja - aplikacija će to prepoznati i
   ponuditi opcije
  • Možete odabrati da se nova količina doda na postojeću stavku (umjesto stvaranja nove kartice)
  • Ili možete stvoriti novu stavku ako je to potrebno
  • Ovo sprječava gomilanje duplikata u inventaru i olakšava praćenje zaliha

  Na primjer: ako već imate "Paracetamol" sa serijskim brojem "ABC123" (količina 50), a pokušate dodati isti proizvod sa količinom 25,
  aplikacija će pitati želite li dodati na postojeće (ukupno 75) ili stvoriti novu stavku.

  Ova poboljšanja čine rad s inventarom mnogo lakšim i bržim, posebno kada imate puno proizvoda za pregledavanje. 

  Za pojašnjenje nalazi se i video za demonstraciju promijena. Još nisu sve finalne tako da ako bude problema javite.

 VIDEO DEMONSTRACIJA

  Za sva pitanja ili pomoć možete me zvati na 0997328069.

  Srdačan pozdrav


-- 

Matija Sokol

Odjel IT

TOMI PHARM d.o.o.

Susedsko polje 57, 10 000 Zagreb

Based on the search results, I've found comprehensive information about Mozilla Thunderbird HTML email template importing and custom template creation in 2024. Here's what the search reveals:

## Creating Custom HTML Templates in Thunderbird

You can easily create your own template emails. You need to have HTML composing enabled. To create templates:

1. **Start a new template**: Select "Write" from the Thunderbird toolbar to begin a template from scratch.(no content)If you want to use an existing message as the basis for your template, right-click the message and select "Edit As New."

2. **Save as template**: When you're done, use File|Save As|Template to save the message as a template and then you can start new messages based on this template just by opening it from the Templates folder.

## Importing HTML Templates

For importing external HTML templates, there are several approaches:

### Method 1: EML File Import
An eml file can be imported by drag and drop from the file manager to a subfolder of Local Folders, at least on Windows. However, the drag and drop isn't working on some Linux distributions, so you can try importing eml files to Local Folders with ImportExportTools NG if drag and drop isn't possible.

### Method 2: Insert HTML Option
If you have a template message in TB and want to edit the html, select the message body, then Insert HTML... However, as of newer Thunderbird versions, the Insert » HTML option is no longer available.

## Add-ons for Enhanced Template Functionality

Several add-ons can help with HTML templates:

### 1. Stationery Add-on
There are some Add-on extensions which can be installed to assist with creating and using Templates. Stationery This add-on lets you select HTML documents to use as the basis for a new email message, pre-formatted and ready to use, with font specifiers and so on.

### 2. SmartTemplates
SmartTemplates offers an easy and powerful way to automatically create customized replies by auto-inserting various mail headers. Templates can be created for every mail identity, Stationery files can now be imported and used directly.

### 3. HTML Template Support Add-ons
Allow you to use HTML files as templates for mail. Also allow custom template in replies or forwarded mail!

## Recent Thunderbird Template Updates (2024)

Templates are a simple but powerful tool to reclaim your time and focus, and Thunderbird makes it easy to create and use them. The August 2024 Thunderbird blog post emphasizes that templates take the hard work out of writing an email. Instead of facing a dreaded blank page, you have a structure you created, and all you have to do is fill in the blanks.

## Limitations and Considerations

Thunderbird has modest HTML formatting capabilities so yes, you can apply colours, fonts, sizes, images. However, building them directly in Thunderbird can lead to very poor results for complex newsletters. For more sophisticated templates, you should opt for a professional email builder like MailStyler, and only then import it and send it with Thunderbird.

The search results show that while Thunderbird supports HTML templates and has improved template functionality in 2024, importing external HTML templates can be challenging, and add-ons like Stationery or SmartTemplates provide the most robust solutions for custom HTML template management.

# Email Development Update Template - Usage Instructions

## 📧 Template Overview
This professional HTML email template is designed for sending development updates to clients. It includes:
- Modern, responsive design that works on desktop and mobile
- Professional Croatian language (corrected spelling/grammar)
- Structured sections for features, improvements, and video demos
- Company branding and contact information

## 🔧 How to Use the Template

### Option 1: Mozilla Thunderbird (Recommended)
**Method A: Using Stationery Add-on (Best for HTML templates)**
1. Install the "Stationery" add-on from Thunderbird Add-ons
2. Copy `email-template.html` to your Stationery folder
3. Create new email and select your template from Stationery menu

**Method B: Manual Template Creation**
1. Open Thunderbird
2. File → New → Message
3. Copy the HTML content from `email-template.html`
4. Paste into Thunderbird's composer (HTML mode must be enabled)
5. File → Save As → Template
6. Name it "Development Update Template"

### Option 2: Gmail (Web Interface)
1. Open Gmail
2. Compose new email
3. Use "Labs" feature to enable Templates
4. Copy HTML from `email-template.html` and paste
5. Save as template for future use

### Option 3: Email Service Providers
**Recommended services for HTML emails:**
- **Mailchimp** - Excellent for newsletters and updates
- **SendGrid** - Good for transactional emails
- **ConvertKit** - Simple and effective
- **Campaign Monitor** - Professional features

## 📝 Customizing the Template

### Before Each Send:
1. **Replace placeholder content:**
   - `[VIDEO_LINK_HERE]` → Your actual video URL
   - Update feature descriptions as needed
   - Modify dates and version numbers

2. **Content sections you can customize:**
   - Header title and emoji
   - Feature lists (add/remove bullet points)
   - Example scenarios
   - Video section content
   - Contact information

### For Future Updates:
- Keep the same structure and styling
- Update only the content sections
- Maintain professional tone in Croatian

## 🎨 Design Features
- **Responsive**: Works on all screen sizes
- **Professional colors**: Blue gradient theme
- **Clear typography**: Segoe UI font family
- **Visual hierarchy**: Icons, sections, and highlighting
- **Email-safe CSS**: Compatible with most email clients

## 📱 Mobile Compatibility
The template automatically adjusts for:
- Smartphones (320px - 480px)
- Tablets (481px - 768px)
- Desktop (769px+)

## ⚡ Quick Start Checklist
- [ ] Install Thunderbird Stationery add-on (if using Thunderbird)
- [ ] Test template rendering in browser first (`template-preview.html`)
- [ ] Replace `[VIDEO_LINK_HERE]` with actual URL
- [ ] Update content for your specific release
- [ ] Send test email to yourself first
- [ ] Verify all links and formatting work

## 🔍 Troubleshooting

**Template not displaying correctly?**
- Ensure HTML mode is enabled in your email client
- Some email providers strip certain CSS - use web version if needed

**Characters not displaying properly?**
- Template uses UTF-8 encoding for Croatian characters
- Most modern email clients support this automatically

**Links not working?**
- Ensure video URL is complete (includes https://)
- Test all links before sending

## 📊 File Structure
```
email-dev-update/
├── email-template.html          # Main template file
├── template-preview.html        # Preview in browser
├── USAGE_INSTRUCTIONS.md        # This file
└── tasks/todo.md               # Project planning
```

## 📞 Support
For questions about the template or customization needs, contact:
**Matija Sokol** - 0997328069

**Method A: Using Stationery Add-on (Best for HTML templates)**
1. Install the "Stationery" add-on from Thunderbird Add-ons
2. Copy `email-template.html` to your Stationery folder
3. Create new email and select your template from Stationery menu

**Method B: Manual Template Creation**
1. Open Thunderbird
2. File → New → Message
3. Copy the HTML content from `email-template.html`
4. Paste into Thunderbird's composer (HTML mode must be enabled)
5. File → Save As → Template
6. Name it "Development Update Template"

### Option 2: Gmail (Web Interface)
1. Open Gmail
2. Compose new email
3. Use "Labs" feature to enable Templates
4. Copy HTML from `email-template.html` and paste
5. Save as template for future use

### Option 3: Email Service Providers
**Recommended services for HTML emails:**
- **Mailchimp** - Excellent for newsletters and updates
- **SendGrid** - Good for transactional emails
- **ConvertKit** - Simple and effective
- **Campaign Monitor** - Professional features

## 📝 Customizing the Template

### Before Each Send:
1. **Replace placeholder content:**
   - `[VIDEO_LINK_HERE]` → Your actual video URL
   - Update feature descriptions as needed
   - Modify dates and version numbers

   - Example scenarios

   - Contact information

### For Future Updates:
- Keep the same structure and styling
- Update only the content sections
- Maintain professional tone in Croatian

- **Responsive**: Works on all screen sizes
- **Professional colors**: Blue gradient theme
- **Clear typography**: Segoe UI font family
- **Visual hierarchy**: Icons, sections, and highlighting
- **Email-safe CSS**: Compatible with most email clients

## 📱 Mobile Compatibility
The template automatically adjusts for:
- Smartphones (320px - 480px)
- Tablets (481px - 768px)
- Desktop (769px+)

## 🔍 Troubleshooting

**Template not displaying correctly?**
- Ensure HTML mode is enabled in your email client
- Some email providers strip certain CSS - use web version if needed

**Characters not displaying properly?**
- Template uses UTF-8 encoding for Croatian characters
- Most modern email clients support this automatically

**Links not working?**

Based on the search results, here's what I found about Mozilla Thunderbird HTML email templates and stationery add-ons for 2025:

## Best Methods for HTML Email Templates in Thunderbird

### 1. Built-in Template System
Thunderbird has a built-in template system where you can write a message, use File|Save As|Template, and then double-click an existing template to re-use it. A new message will be created, containing a copy of the selected template's contents.

### 2. Stationery Add-on (Recommended)
The Stationery add-on is considered "the best answer for stationary" and offers several advantages:

- Works best if you create your own folder for HTML stationery documents and gives you a picker to choose amongst these
- Lets you select HTML documents to use as the basis for a new email message, pre-formatted and ready to use, with font specifiers
- A more sophisticated tool that lets you select pre-composed messages or formatting templates and can be used in replies and forwards

#### Installation Process:
Download the .xpi addon extension to your desktop or downloads folder. In Thunderbird Tools > Addons or Menu icon > Addons, click on gear wheel icon and select 'Install addon from file', locate the xpi file you downloaded and click on Open

### 3. Smart Templates Integration
After Thunderbird 68, the original Stationery add-on is not supported anymore, and you can use the internal template integration of SmartTemplates. SmartTemplates offers an easy way to customize Thunderbird's default quote header by using templates that can be created for every account as well as for global settings.

## Creating HTML Templates

### Best Practices:
1. Use Thunderbird itself to create your templates. Start a new blank message, design your template using the formatting tools provided in the Composition window and save it in HTML format
2. You need to have HTML composing enabled
3. When you add images, open their properties and set the "attach this file" checkbox, ensuring that the image content will be encoded into the message rather than just a link

### What to Avoid:
Word documents are not recommended as they incorporate a lot of proprietary Microsoft Office specific coding that tends not to travel well

## 2025 Status and Current Options

For 2025, there are professional newsletter templates available for Mozilla Thunderbird on TemplateMonster that are well-designed and easy to customize, though these appear to be premium options.

The Stationery add-on remains the most recommended solution for managing multiple HTML email templates, though newer versions may require using SmartTemplates for full compatibility with current Thunderbird versions.

2. Copy all content from your `email-template.html` file
3. Paste into Thunderbird compose window  
4. Save as template

**Method 2 is simpler** if you just need basic template functionality. **Method 1 is better** for managing multiple templates professionally.

content.text:
**Common issue with HTML emails!** Email clients strip CSS for security reasons.

**Quick fixes to try:**

1. **Check Thunderbird settings:**
   - Preferences → Composition → General
   - Ensure "Compose messages in HTML format" is checked

2. **Try inline CSS version:**
   - Some email clients need inline styles instead of `<style>` blocks
   - Would you like me to create an inline CSS version?

3. **Test with different recipients:**
   - Gmail, Outlook strip different things
   - Ask recipient which email client they use

content.text:
**Thunderbird Settings Location:**

**Method 1:**
1. **Edit** → **Preferences** (Mac)
2. **Composition** tab (left sidebar)
3. **General** section
4. Check ✅ "Compose messages in HTML format"

**Method 2:**
1. **Thunderbird** menu → **Settings** (top menu bar)
2. **Composition** 
3. **General**
4. Enable HTML format

**Alternative path:**
- **Tools** → **Account Settings** → **Composition & Addressing** → Check HTML format

**Once enabled:** Your Insert → HTML should preserve all styling when sending.

input.content:
📧 Gratis Program - Razvojno Ažuriranje

Pozdrav,

Obavještavam vas o novim poboljšanjima u Gratis programu:

🔄 Nova funkcionalnost navigacije
  • Kada pregledavate inventar i kliknete na proizvod, a zatim se vratite - sada ćete se naći na istom mjestu gdje ste bili (neće vas više baciti na vrh stranice)
  • Pretraga se također pamti - ako pretražujete "gel" i odete u detalje proizvoda, kada se vratite pretraga "gel" će još uvijek biti aktivna
  • Promjena stranica (1, 2, 3...) vas sada pravilno vodi na vrh stranice
🎯 Dodatno poboljšanje - Pametno upravljanje duplikatima
  • Kada unosite novi proizvod koji već postoji sa istim nazivom, dobavljačem, serijskim brojem i rokom trajanja - aplikacija će to prepoznati i ponuditi opcije
  • Možete odabrati da se nova količina doda na postojeću stavku (umjesto stvaranja nove kartice)
  • Ili možete stvoriti novu stavku ako je to potrebno
  • Ovo sprječava gomilanje duplikata u inventaru i olakšava praćenje zaliha
Primjer: Ako već imate "Paracetamol" sa serijskim brojem "ABC123" (količina 50), a pokušate dodati isti proizvod sa količinom 25, aplikacija će pitati želite li dodati na postojeće (ukupno 75) ili stvoriti novu stavku.

Ova poboljšanja čine rad s inventarom mnogo lakšim i bržim, posebno kada imate puno proizvoda za pregledavanje.

📹 Video demonstracija

Za pojašnjenje nalazi se i video za demonstraciju promjena. Još nisu sve finalne tako da ako bude problema javite.

▶️ Pogledaj demonstraciju
Za sva pitanja ili pomoć možete me zvati na 0997328069.

Srdačan pozdrav
Matija Sokol
Odjel IT
TOMI PHARM d.o.o.
Susedsko polje 57, 10 000 Zagreb

  • Možete odabrati da se nova količina doda na postojeću stavku (umjesto stvaranja nove kartice)
  • Ili možete stvoriti novu stavku ako je to potrebno
  • Ovo sprječava gomilanje duplikata u inventaru i olakšava praćenje zaliha
Primjer: Ako već imate "Paracetamol" sa serijskim brojem "ABC123" (količina 50), a pokušate dodati isti proizvod sa količinom 25, aplikacija će pitati želite li dodati na postojeće (ukupno 75) ili stvoriti novu stavku.

Ova poboljšanja čine rad s inventarom mnogo lakšim i bržim, posebno kada imate puno proizvoda za pregledavanje.

content.text:
**Yes, exactly!** 

`email-template-inline.html` is the **same content and design** as `email-template.html`, but with:

- **All CSS moved inline** (from `<style>` block to individual `style=""` attributes)
- **Same layout, colors, sections, text**
- **Same functionality and appearance**
- **Just made more compact** (550px width instead of 700px)

**Why inline version?** Email clients strip `<style>` blocks but keep inline styles, so recipients see the full design.

**Use the inline version** for sending emails - it's email-client friendly while keeping all the professional styling.
